name: cant name these
content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><scxml     datamodel="ecmascript"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/07/scxml"    version="1.0">    <datamodel>        <data id="i" expr="0"/>    </datamodel>    <state id="a">        <transition target="b" event="t"/>      </state>    <state id="b">        <transition target="done" cond="i === 100"/>        <transition>            <assign location="i" expr="i + 1"/>        </transition>    </state>    <state id="done"/></scxml>
